thread.title: Tencent bringing Star Wars to China as Youku, Alibaba target US film and TV franchises for booming home streaming market
thread.title_full: Tencent bringing Star Wars to China as Youku, Alibaba target US film and TV franchises for booming home streaming market

title: Tencent bringing Star Wars to China as Youku, Alibaba target US film and TV franchises for booming home streaming market
text: Tencent bringing Star Wars to China as Youku, Alibaba target US film and TV franchises for booming home streaming market Wednesday, 16 September 2015 (15 minutes ago) Streaming video users in China will soon be spoiled for choice for US film and television shows, with three of the country's major internet companies making strides into the entertainment business . ‘Mad Max: Fury Road’ Storms Home-Video Sales Charts 01:01 Warner’s “Mad Max: Fury Road” easily topped the national home video sales charts its first week in stores, debuting at No. 1 on both Nielsen’s overall disc and dedicated Blu-ray Disc sales charts the week ending Sept. 6.The theatrical blockbuster, the fourth film in the post-apocalyptic... Recent related news Alibaba and Lionsgate are partnered on streaming, Tencent just picked up digital rights to all of the Star Wars movies and now China’s Youku Tudou is getting... Deadline Hollywood 18 hours ago - US You Might Like
